title: Got demoted when I just got promoted when I lost no games at 0 LP before
body: I was promoted to d1, and I won 2 games. Then i lost 2 games, and since i lose less than I win, i only got to 0 LP after 3 losses, and then on my 4rth loss, I got demoted? I should still have at least one or two games of immunity left

replies.body: It looks like you were going to be going up a division and not a tier, which only gives your 3 games of demotion immunity. After you promoted to D1, you played 6 games before being demoted, which would have used up those 3 games of immunity.
